title: Personal development curriculum
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Sabina Baltrukomis and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: Highlights the process of practical problem solving in personal development. Shows children engaged in a process of thinking, feeling, and making decisions about themselves and others that lead to appropriate action.
